faqs.q: How many calories are in one piece of bacon?
faqs.a: About 43 kcal for one medium cooked slice.

faqs.q: Is bacon high in fat or protein?
faqs.a: One piece has 3.3 g fat and 3 g protein, with high sodium at 192 mg.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in bacon?
faqs.a: Pan-frying retains more fat; baking or microwaving can reduce calories slightly by draining excess.
